attributes.additional_details:
Thankyou for viewing my e-petition and if you, like myself are a father who is trying to get rights for his child. Please sign.

I won't go into to much detail, but me and my girlfriend where in a long distance relationship for a while. She split up with me after our son was born and I went through a terrible time coming to terms with how often i'd see my child.

Please sign this Petition to encourage the government to allow equal custody of the child in terms of, christmas, birthdays ect.
